Articles.Content: Was playing some KSP this morning and decided I would land my probe on duna and forgot to retract my solar panels before hitting the atmosphere so I hit F9 and forgot that my last quicksave was from yesterday -4000 science gathering. Now I have to do all that work again , my fault that I didn't quicksave more but it would be nice to have an autosave after you recover a vehicle at the flight report screen that shows the science gathered or a revamped save management system that lets the user create "hard saves" whenever they want.
